Sentencas: Optimisation of the composition or rare-earth-free perovskites is of considerable interest for their application as air electrodes in intermediate temperature solid oxide cells (IT-SOCs).
Titulo: Enhancement of electrochemical performance of SrFe0.5Co0.5O3-δ as air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide cells via Sb and Mo doping

Sentencas: Herein, we report the effects of Mo and Sb doping (5 mol %) of SrFe0.5Co0.5O3-delta (SFC) on oxygen content, thermal behaviour, electrochemical properties and stability.
Titulo: Enhancement of electrochemical performance of SrFe0.5Co0.5O3-δ as air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide cells via Sb and Mo doping

Sentencas: Phase-pure, XRD-cubic perovskite is achieved on sintering powder derived from Pechini synthesis in the range 1000-1100 degrees C for SFC, SrFe0.475Co0.475Mo0.05O3-delta (SFCM) and SrFe0.475Co0.475Sb0.05O3-delta (SFCSb).
Titulo: Enhancement of electrochemical performance of SrFe0.5Co0.5O3-δ as air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide cells via Sb and Mo doping

Sentencas: Oxygen content determined by redox titration is greater for the Mo- and Sb-doped phases than for SFC, although oxygen loss occurring at > 350 degrees C is greatest for SFCSb.
Titulo: Enhancement of electrochemical performance of SrFe0.5Co0.5O3-δ as air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide cells via Sb and Mo doping

Sentencas: The higher total oxygen content of the Mo-doped phase is expected to increase the electron-hole content resulting in higher conductivity (sigma = 340.5 S cm(-1) at 300 degrees C in O-2).
Titulo: Enhancement of electrochemical performance of SrFe0.5Co0.5O3-δ as air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide cells via Sb and Mo doping

Sentencas: In contrast, the greater oxygen-vacancy content with increasing temperature of the Sb-doped material is associated with the most competitive electrode-polarisation resistance (<0.1 Omega cm(2) at 700 degrees C).
Titulo: Enhancement of electrochemical performance of SrFe0.5Co0.5O3-δ as air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide cells via Sb and Mo doping

Sentencas: The greater relative effect of cathodic and anodic polarisation on improving electrochemical performance at lower temperatures highlights the potential of the studied compositions as air electrodes in IT-SOCs.
Titulo: Enhancement of electrochemical performance of SrFe0.5Co0.5O3-δ as air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide cells via Sb and Mo doping
